channel.title: Proxies on Cláudio Silva's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Proxies on Cláudio Silva's Blog

item.title: HTTP 403 error - PowerShell Remoting, Different Domains and Proxies
item.description: On my day to day work I use Nagios monitoring software. I want to add some custom SQL Server scripts to enrich the monitoring, and to accomplish this I will need to: Find a folder Create a sub folder Copy bunch of file edit a ini file to verify/add new entries all of this for every single host on my entire estate. Obviously (for me :-) ) I decided to use PowerShell!
